text: Removing Item From List - during iteration - what's wrong with this idiom?
As an experiment, I did this:

code:
letters=['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l']
for i in letters:
    letters.remove(i)
print letters

text: The last print shows that not all items were removed ?
How it could this be re-written to remove every item ?
